alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 11 at 7:16PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect through Tuesday... * Thunderstorms over Manu`a will produce gusty winds at times for the territory, but mainly over Manu`a. North and northwest winds may enhance windspeeds on downslope mountain ranges. * TIMING...through Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 716 PO ASO GAFUA TESEMA 11 2023 ...FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O faititili o loo i luga o Manu`a ua mafua ai ona agi malosi savili ma agi faata`uta`u i taimi. O savili mai matu ma matu i sisifo e malolosi atu i le faaifo i mauga... * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Lua * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 30 i le 35 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi faata`uta`u ai o le a taunuu mai i luga o le atunu`u. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
